name: memory
prompt: Create a memory card matching game. Display a 4x4 grid of face-down cards. The player moves a cursor with the D-pad and flips cards with A. When two cards are flipped, check if they match. If they match, remove them. If not, flip them back after a short delay. Track moves and show victory when all pairs are matched.
description: Card matching memory game demonstrating grid selection, state tracking, and match detection
